skills.name: Apportation
skills.desc: Transport pickupable items in the target area into your inventory.

skills.name: Blessed Smoke Cloud
skills.desc: Conjure a cloud of thick blessed smoke that makes characters invisible.

skills.name: Blinding Radiance
skills.desc: Enemies around you receive [X] air damage. Every enemy withint a 5m radius turns blind.
skills.special: 100% chance to cast an aura for 1 turn.

skills.name: Breathing Bubble
skills.desc: Creates a bubble of clean air around your head, allowing you to ignore effects of cloud surfaces. Immune to Suffocation and Silence.
skills.special: Sets Breathing Bubble for 5 turn(s).

skills.name: Chain Lightning
skills.desc: Shoot a stunning bolt of lightning that forks up to 8 times in a 8m radius and deals [X] Air Damage to each target.
skills.special: Sets Shocked for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence

skills.name: Closed Circuit
skills.desc: Deals [X] Air Damage to enemies around you; then creates cursed static clouds on the edges of the spell.
skills.special: Sets Air Immunity for 1 turn(s). Sets Shocked for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence

skills.name: Dazing Bolt
skills.desc: An electrical bolt falls from the sky, dealing [X] Air Damage to characters and items in the area, and setting Shocked status.
skills.special: Sets Shocked for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Electric Discharge
skills.desc: An electrical jolt deals air damage to target character. Sets status Shocked.
skills.special: Sets shocked for 2 turns. Damage is based on skill level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Erratic Wisp
skills.desc: Cause target character to teleport in a random direction each time they are attacked. Increases Air Resistance by 40%.
skills.special: Sets Erratic Wisp for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Evasive Aura
skills.desc: Sets Evasive Aura for you and allies around you. Dodging chance is increased by 90% and your Movement Speed is increased by 1m.
skills.special: Sets Erratic Wisp for 1 turn(s).

skills.name: Favourable Wind
skills.desc: Control the forces of nature so the wind is literally at your party's back. An aura increases you allies' movement speeds while they stay close to you.
skills.special: Sets Favourable Winds Aura for 4 turn(s).

skills.name: Mass Breathing Bubbles
skills.desc: Set Breathing Bubbles on allies around you, allowing them to ignore effects of cloud surfaces and making them immune to Suffocation and Silence.
skills.special: Sets Mass Breathing Bubbles for 5 turn(s).

skills.name: Nether Swamp
skills.desc: Make two characters switch places. One of the characters can be you.
skills.special: Sets Nether Swap for 1 turn(s).

skills.name: Pressure Spike
skills.desc: Condense all cloud surfaces in the area. Deals air damage to enemies and douses fire.
skills.special: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Shocking Touch
skills.desc: Stuns nearby enemies and deals [X] air damage.
skills.special: Sets shocked for 2 turns. Damage is based on skill level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Smoke Cover
skills.desc: Create a smoke cloud around you, hiding from sight.

skills.name: Superconductor
skills.desc: Shoot forking spikes at all enemies within the area, dealing [X] Air Damage and setting Shocked.
skills.special: Sets Shocked for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Teleportation
skills.desc: Teleport a target character or item to a point of your choosing.
skills.special: Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.desc: A storm rages in the target area, hitting enemies with lightning bolts for 3 turns.

skills.name: Tornado
skills.desc: A tornado moves randomly around the battlefield, removing surfaces and revealing invisible characters. Also clears Invisible, Burning and Slowed.

skills.name: Uncanny Evasion
skills.desc: Target character's dodging is increased by 90% and your Movement Speed is increased by 20%.
skills.special: Sets Evading for 1 turn(s).

skills.name: Vacuum Aura
skills.desc: Deal [X] Air Damage to enemies in the area. Caster receives an aura that sets Silence and Suffocating on enemies.
skills.special: Sets Vacuum Aura for 3 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence

skills.name: Vacuum Touch
skills.desc: Deal [X] Air Damage. Set Suffocation and Silence on target.
skills.special: Sets Suffocating for 1 turn(s). Sets Silenced for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Vaporize
skills.desc: Remove Petrified and Frozen from target character. Vaporise ground surfaces into clouds. Does not work on Oil, Ice or Lava surfaces

skills.name: Acid Spores
skills.desc: Shoot spores of corrosive acid, dealing [X] Poison Damage.
skills.special: Set Poisoned for 3 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

skills.name: Contamination
skills.desc: Deals [X] Poison Damage to enemies and undead allies around you and can poison them. Turns water, blood surfaces and clouds in to poison!
skills.special: Set Poisoned for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

skills.name: Corrosive Spray
skills.desc: Destroy [X] Physical Armour physical  on targets in a cone, and set Acid and Atrophy
skills.special: Set Acid for 2 turn(s). Set Atrophy for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

skills.name: Corrosive Touch
skills.desc: Destroy [X] Physical Armour on target character, and set Acid status.
skills.special: Set Acid for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

skills.name: Dust Blast
skills.desc: Throw dust at all enemies in range, blinding them and dealing [X] Earth Damage.
skills.special: Set Blinded for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.desc: Deals [X] Earth Damage and Knockdown enemy characters and items around you. Creates 8 random oil surfaces within the area.
skills.special: Set Knocked Down for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

skills.name: Fortify
skills.desc: Provides [X] Physical Armour. While Fortified, the target cannot be teleported. Removes Poisoned, Bleeding, Burning, Acid, Decaying.
skills.special: Set Fortified for 3 turn(s).

skills.name: Fossil Strike
skills.desc: A giant rock with sticky oil that deals [X] Earth Damage. Creates an oil surface where it lands.
skills.special: Damage is bases on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

skills.name: Impalement
skills.desc: Spikes impale all characters and items, setting Crippled and dealing [X] Earth Damage. Also creates an oil puddle.
skills.special: Set Crippled for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

skills.name: Living Wall
skills.desc: Vines sprout from the ground to block the path in the target area, emitting poison clouds around them.

skills.name: Mass Oily Carapace
skills.desc: Each ally consumes oil surfaces around them, converting the oil surfaces to Physical Armour physical. Removed Slowed.
skills.special: Restore up to 34 Physical Armour, depending on relevant surface area.

skills.name: Mend Metal
skills.desc: Allies near you start slowly regenerating Physical Armour.
skills.special: Restore [X] Physical Armour for 3 turn(s).

skills.name: Oily Carapace
skills.desc: Consume oil surfaces around you and convert them to Physical Armour. Removes Slowed.
skills.special: Restore up to 34 Physical Armour, depending on relevant surface area.

skills.name: Poison Dart
skills.desc: Cast a magical poisonous dart that does [X] Poison Damage, and creates a puddle of poison.
skills.special: Set Poisoned for 3 turn(s). Damage is bases on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

skills.name: Poison Wave
skills.desc: Poison erupts from the caster in a circular wave, dealing [X] Poison Damage and forming poison clouds. Gives immunity to poison and earth damage for 1 turn.
skills.special: Set Earth Immunity for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

skills.name: Pyroclastic Eruption
skills.desc: Multiple oil-filled rocks erupt from the caster at all enemies in the area. On impact, they create oil surfaces and deal [X] Earth Damage.
skills.special: Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

skills.name: Reactive Armor
skills.desc: Deal [X] Physical Damage, based on your current Physical Armour, in a wave of metal spikes to everyone in the area (including yourself).
skills.special: Damage is based on your current Physical Armour.

skills.name: Siphon Poison
skills.desc: Remove poison surfaces and clouds. Gain poison damage bonus to weapon attacks and weapon-based skills (dependent upon size of poison area cleared).
skills.special: Set Siphon Poison for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Summon Artillery Plant
skills.desc: Plant can lob acidic spores and emit cursed poison clouds.
skills.special: The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

skills.name: Throw Dust
skills.desc: Throw dust at a character, blinding them and dealing [X] Earth Damage. Clears surfaces and clouds in the area.
skills.special: Set Blinded for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

skills.name: Turn to Oil
skills.desc: Turn water and blood surfaces into oil. Remove Stun and Shocked from characters.

skills.name: Venom Coating
skills.desc: Coat your weapon with poison, adding [X] Poison Damage to your weapon skills and attacks.
skills.special: Set Venom Coating for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Venomous Aura
skills.desc: Allies in range receive Venom Coating, which adds [X] Poison Damage to weapon skills and attacks.
skills.special: Set Venomous Aura for 4 turn(s).

skills.name: Worm Tremor
skills.desc: Deals [X] Earth Damage to each character in the area. At your command, poisonous worms slither up from the earth, attaching to every character in the area who is not protected by Magical Armour . Affected characters cannot move or teleport, and they receive [X] Poison Damage each turn.
skills.special: Set Entangled for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

skills.name: Arrow Spray
skills.desc: Fire 16 arrows in a 60 degree arc. Each arrow deals 40% damage.
skills.special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

skills.name: Arrow Storm
skills.desc: 16 arrows fall from the sky in the target area, each dealing 40% damage.
skills.special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

skills.name: Assassinate
skills.desc: Attacking your target with meticulous aim, dealing 135% damage in one shot. When performed from stealth, this attack gains a 50% damage increase.
skills.special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

skills.name: Ballistic Shot
skills.desc: A shot that deals 100% damage and receives 5% bonus damage per 1m distance to target.
skills.special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

skills.name: Barrage
skills.desc: Fire three arrows at three targets of your choice, each dealing 60% damage.
skills.special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

skills.name: Elemental Arrowheads
skills.desc: Target a surface in melee radius. For one turn, elemental damage matching that surface is added to your ranged weapon attacks and ranged weapon-based skills.

skills.name: Farsight
skills.desc: Increase the range of a targeted character's ranged attacks and skills by 4m.
skills.special: Set Farsight for 3 Turn(s).

skills.name: First Aid
skills.desc: Heals target for [X] Vitality. Cures Crippled, Atrophy, Knocked Down, Blind, Silenced, Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned, and Diseased.
skills.special: Restore [X] Vitality. Set Rested for 1 turn(s).

skills.name: Glitter Dust
skills.desc: Target is marked, reducing its ability to dodge. Prevents target from going invisible.
skills.special: Set Marked for 3 turn(s).

skills.name: Marksman's Fang
skills.desc: Shoot an arrow that goes straight through enemies. Each enemy that's hit takes 100% damage, ignoring armour.
skills.special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

skills.name: Pin Down
skills.desc: Deals 120% damage and Cripples target character.
skills.special: Set Crippled for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

skills.name: Reactive Shot
skills.desc: Target a circular area. Until your next turn, you will reflexively shoot at the first three enemies moving within this area.
skills.special: Set Reactive Shot for 1 Turn(s).

skills.name: Ricochet
skills.desc: Fire a normal arrow that deals 90% damage and then finds another target within 5m. Forks up to 2 times.
skills.special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

skills.name: Sky Shot
skills.desc: Leap into the air before shooting, gaining damage bonuses for your superior height. Deals 100% Damage.
skills.special: This skill receives high ground bonuses regardless of elevation. Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

skills.name: Tactical Retreat
skills.desc: Apply haste to yourself, then teleport away from imminent danger.
skills.special: Set Hasted for 1 Turn(s)

skills.name: Arcane Stitch
skills.desc: Fully restore target character's Magic Armour. Removes Frozen, Stunned, Petrified, Plague, Suffocating, Poisoned, Burning, Necrofire, Terrified, Silenced, Taunted, Mad. Restore [X] Magic Armour.

skills.name: Armour of Frost
skills.desc: Ice forms a defensive barrier around the target, providing [X] Magical Armour magic_armour-icon. Cures Burning, Poisoned, Stunned, Frozen, Suffocating and Petrified. Sets Magic Shell for 3 turn(s).

skills.name: Cleanse Wounds
skills.desc: Heal target and create a water puddle beneath them. Remove Burning, Diseased, Decaying Touch, Poisoned and Bleeding. Restore [X] Vitality

skills.name: Cryogenic Stasis
skills.desc: Target ally enters Cryogenic Stasis. Though incapacitated, they become immune to all damage, and heal over time. Removes Shackles Of Pain. Sets Permafrost for 1 Turn(s).

skills.name: Cryotherapy
skills.desc: Consume Frozen surfaces around you and convert them to Magic Armour. Removes Burning and Necrofire. Restore up to 34 Magic Armour depending on relevant surface area.

skills.name: Cryogenic Stasis
skills.desc: Target ally enters Cryogenic Stasis. Though incapacitated, they become immune to all damage, and heal over time. Removes Shackles Of Pain.

skills.name: Deep Freeze
skills.desc: Targets in the cone that are frozen and under 10% Vitality shatter and instantly die. Otherwise they receive [X] Water Damage and become Frozen. Set Frozen for 1 Turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Global Cooling
skills.desc: Set Chilled on enemies around you and deal [X] Water Damage. Freeze all succeptible surfaces. Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Hail Storm
skills.desc: 20 ice shards fall from the sky, each dealing [X] Water Damage to characters within 13m range from impact. Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Hail Strike
skills.desc: Icicles fall from the sky, chilling enemies and dealing [X] water damage. They create Ice surfaces where they hit the ground. Damages is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Healing Ritual
skills.desc: Shoot a bolt of healing energy that will jump to nearby allies. Restore 7 Vitality

skills.name: Healing Tears
skills.desc: Three healing tears circle around you. Everytime an ally walks into melee range near you, a healing tear bathes them. Set Healing Tears for 3 Turn(s)

skills.name: Ice Fan
skills.desc: Target 3 positions and shoot an ice shard at each one, dealing [X] Water Damage and making targets Chilled. Set Chilled for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

skills.name: Mass Cleanse Wounds
skills.desc: Heal yourself and allies around you. Create a water puddle beneath every target. Remove Necrofire, Burning, Diseased, Decaying Touch, Poisoned, Bleeding, Suffocation and Acid. Restore 15 Vitality

skills.name: Mass Cryotherapy
skills.desc: Each ally consumes Frozen surfaces around them, converting the frozen surfaces to Magic Armour. Removes Burning and Necrofire. Restore up to 34 Magic Armour depending on relevant surface area.

skills.name: Rain
skills.desc: Create a spreading water surface which douses fires. Set Wet status on characters in the area.

skills.name: Restoration
skills.desc: Restore Vitality of a target character. Restoration also cures Poisoned and Bleeding. Restore [X] Vitality for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Soothing Cold
skills.desc: Regenerate Magical Armour magic_armour-icon for all alies around caster. Restore [x] Magic Armour for 3 turn(s).

skills.name: Steam Lance
skills.desc: Releases a stream of Blessed Steam that heals characters in its path. Restore 6 Vitality for 3 Turn(s)

skills.name: Vampiric Hunger
skills.desc: Set Vampiric Hunger on target character, adding 50% Life Steal for 2 turns. Life Steal heals you in proportion to the damage you deal to Vitality. Set Vampiric Hunger for 2 Turn(s)

skills.name: Vampiric Hunger Aura
skills.desc: Set Vampiric Hunger Aura on every ally around you, adding 50% Life Steal for 2 turns. Life Steal heals you in proportion to the damage you deal to Vitality. Set Vampiric Hunger Aura for 2 Turn(s)

skills.name: Winter Blast
skills.desc: Deal [X] Water Damage and set Chilled status on characters in the area. Freeze blood and water surfaces. Set Chilled for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

category.name: Black Shroud
category.desc: Create a cloud of cursed smoke in an area, setting Suffocating and Blind on all characters within.

category.name: Blood Storm
category.desc: The sky weeps bloody tears. Bolts of coagulated blood fall on enemy characters in the area, setting Disease and Decaying Touch. Turns all water in the area into blood.

category.name: Blood Sucker
category.desc: Target character consumes blood surfaces around them, restoring Vitality. The more blood, the more they are healed! Restores up to [X] Vitality.

category.name: Bone Cage
category.desc: Increases Physical Armour by [X] and another [X] Physical Armour for each corpse in the area around you.

category.name: Death Wish
category.desc: Target character receives a damage bonus equal to the percentage of their lost Vitality. For example, a character with 30% Vitality will gain a 70% damage bonus. Sets Death Wish for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Decaying Touch
category.desc: Deal [X] physical damage to target character. Sets Decay for 2 turn(s), so the target will take piercing damage from healing spells and potions.

category.name: Grasp of the Starved
category.desc: Undead hands rise from underground, attacking characters that stand in blood surfaces and clouds. Deals [X] physical damage to each character and sets Crippled for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Infect
category.desc: Deal [X] physical damage. Infect a target for 2 turn(s) with a disease that will spread to other nearby characters. Diseased characters deal reduced damage with all attacks and have lowered Constitution.

category.name: Last Rites
category.desc: Sacrifice yourself to bring an ally back to life. Deals [X] piercing damage to you, and resurrects target character with maximum Vitality.

category.name: Living on the Edge
category.desc: For 2 turns your character's Vitality cannot be reduced below 1 point, keeping them alive against all odds. If the target is a summon, their lifetime will be prolonged for the duration. Sets Death Resist for 2 turn(s)

category.name: Mosquito Storm
category.desc: Unleash a swarm of giant mosquitos to suck the blood from your enemies, dealing physical damage and healing yourself. Restore up to [X] Vitality, depending on the damage dealt. Set Bleeding for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Raining Blood
category.desc: Create blood surfaces. Set Bleeding on enemies for 2 turn(s). Douse fire surfaces.

category.name: Raise Bloated Corpse
category.desc: Target a corpse to raise a bloated cadaver that fights for you. It can explode your target, dealing Physical Damage.

category.name: Raise Bone Widow
category.desc: Raise a walking pile of bones which can consume corpses to restore Vitality and receive a stacking damage buff. The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

category.name: Shackles of Pain
category.desc: Mark a target so that it will receive all of the damage you receive. Sets Shackles of Pain for 3 turn(s).

category.name: Silencing Stare
category.desc: Destroy [X-Y] Magic Armour and Silences all enemies in a cone in front of you. Sets Silenced for 1 turn.

category.name: Totems of the Necromancer
category.desc: Spawn bone totems near every enemy (alive or dead) in the area. Bone totems have ranged attacks that deal [x] physical damage.

category.name: Apotheosis
category.desc: You take the first step towards godhood. The cost of all Source skills is reduced by -3 Source Point. Active for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Bull Horns
category.desc: Magnificent horns sprout from your forehead, making you see red. You can rush at your enemies and gore them. Increases Retribution ability by 1 for the duration. Incompatible with Medusa Head. Sets Bull Horns for 4 turn(s).

category.name: Chameleon Cloak
category.desc: Grants you the ability to blend in with any enviroment as if invisible.

category.name: Chicken Claw
category.desc: Turn the target character into a chicken for 2 turn(s). Squawk!

category.name: Equalise
category.desc: Vitality and Armour percentages of characters in target area are summed up and redistributed equally.

category.name: Flaming Skin
category.desc: You get immunity to fire, but lowered resistance to water. You bleed fire. Active for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Flay Skin
category.desc: Destroy [X] Magic Armour on target character. Set Nullified Resistance for 3 turn(s).

category.name: Forced Exchange
category.desc: Exchange Vitality percentages with target character.

category.name: Heart of Steel
category.desc: Your heart pumps liquid metal, creating a robust layer of Physical Armor. This regenerates each turn. Restore [X] Physical Armor for 4 turn(s).

category.name: Icy Skin
category.desc: You get immunity to water, but lowered resistance to fire. You bleed ice. Active for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Jellyfish Skin
category.desc: Bleed electrified water. You get immunity to electricity, but lowered resistance to poison and earth damage. Active for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Medusa Head
category.desc: Snakes grow out of your head, giving you a petrifying aura and the Petrifying Visage skill. Incompatible with Bull Horns. Active for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Poisonous Skin
category.desc: You get immunity to poison and earth, but lowered resistance to air. You bleed poison. Active for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Skin Graft
category.desc: Reset all cooldowns. Removes Burning, Necrofire, Poisoned and Bleeding.

category.name: Spider Legs
category.desc: Spider legs burst from your back. You can create web surfaces in an area to entangle foes. Incompatible with Wings. Active for 3 turn(s).

category.name: Spread Your Wings
category.desc: Sprout temporary wings to fly when you move, allowing you to ignore ground surfaces. Incompatible with Spider Legs. Active for 3 turn(s).

category.name: Summon Oily Blob
category.desc: Fling an Oil Blob at a target point, dealing [X] Earth Damage in the area. Oil Blob deals earth damage with melee attacks and leaves an oil puddle on death. 3m explode radius.

category.name: Tentacle Lash
category.desc: Lash out at your opponent dealing, physical damage and setting Atrophy on them for 1 turn(s).

category.name: Terrain Transmutation
category.desc: Target two circular areas. Swap surfaces and clouds.

category.name: Bleed Fire
category.desc: Enemies will bleed fire when hit. Also creates a small fire area beneath each target and ignites surfaces in the area. Active for 3 turn(s).

category.name: Corpse Explosion
category.desc: Explode the target corpse, dealing physical damage in the area

category.name: Deploy Mass Traps
category.desc: Throw 4 explosive traps at target locations. Each trap takes a turn to activate. When active, trap will explode when a character approaches it.

category.name: Epidemic of Fire
category.desc: Fire a cursed flame that will fork on impact up to 5 times, dealing [X] Fire Damage and leaving a cursed fire surface in its wake. Sets Necrofire for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Fire Whip
category.desc: Long-range attack that deals [X] Fire Damage to a single target, leaving them blind and burning. Sets Blind for 1 turn and Burning for 1 turn.

category.name: Fireball
category.desc: Hurl a fiery sphere that will explode, dealing [X] Fire Damage. Set Burning for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Firebrand
category.desc: An aura that adds [X] fire damage to weapon skills and attacks for all allies within an 8m radius.

category.name: Flaming Crescendo
category.desc: Curse the target to explode (3m explode radius) in 1 turns or on death.

category.name: Flaming Tongues
category.desc: Flaming tongues protect you, immediately attacking approaching enemies. Sets Flaming Tongues for 3 turn(s).

category.name: Haste
category.desc: Sets Hasted on target character for 2 turn(s). Hasted increases movement speed by 2m per AP and gives an additional 1 AP per turn. Clears Slowed and Crippled.

category.name: Ignition
category.desc: Sets enemy characters around you on fire. Deals [X] fire damage to each. Ignites all susceptible surfaces for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Laser Ray
category.desc: Line of intense heat that deals [X] Fire Damage to characters and leaves fire clouds behind. Sets Burning for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Mass Corpse Explosion
category.desc: Explode all corpses around you, dealing physical damage in the area.

category.name: Mass Sabotage
category.desc: Explode 2 random grenades or arrows in the inventories of any enemy in a target circle.

category.name: Master of Sparks
category.desc: Target character and surrounding allies receive Sparkmaster status that adds a chance of fiery sparks to melee attacks. Sets Sparkmaster for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Meteor Shower
category.desc: 25 fireballs come crashing from the sky. Each does [X] Fire Damage within a 3m range from impact.

category.name: Peace of Mind
category.desc: Target gains Clear-Minded for 3 turn(s), which increases Strength, Finesse, Intelligence by 2 and Wits by 5. Removes Blinded, Terrified, Charmed, Taunted, Sleeping, Enraged and Mad.

category.name: Sabotage
category.desc: If target character is carrying grenades or arrows, a random one explodes in their inventory. Explodes 1 random Arrow(s) or Grenade(s) on target's inventory.

category.name: Searing Daggers
category.desc: Shoot 3 flaming daggers at targets of your choice, each creating a fire surface and dealing [X] fire damage. Sets Burning for 2 turn(s).

category.name: Sparking Swings
category.desc: Receive Sparkstriker status for 3 turn(s). This causes your melee attacks to create a spark projectile that bounces off the initial target to hit the closest enemy. Has 4 charges.

category.name: Spontaneous Combustion
category.desc: Deal [X] Fire Damage to target character. If the character is affected by Burning or Necrofire, remove those statuses and deal additional damage for each turn of duration remaining.

category.name: Summon Fire Slug
category.desc: Summon a Fire Slug. Your Fire Slug can create fire surfaces and launch linear fire attacks. The stats of the summon will depend on the caster's level and summoning ability. Active for 5 turns.

category.name: Supernova
category.desc: Explode, creating fire surfaces and dealing [X] Fire Damage in a large area around you (except areas blocked by obstacles).

category.name: Throw Explosive Trap
category.desc: Throw an explosive trap at target locations. Trap takes a turn to activate. When active, trap will explode when a character approaches it.

name: Adrenaline
desc: Gain 2 Action Points immediately, but lose 2 Action Points next turn. Any Action Points over your maximum are lost. Does not break Invisibility or Sneaking.

name: Backlash
desc: Jump over the enemy, landing behind their back and backstabbing them for [X] physical damage. 100% chance to Backstab.

name: Chloroform
desc: Throw a knife at your opponent, dealing [X] physical damage. Can backstab.

name: Cloak and Dagger
desc: Teleport without breaking sneaking. Does not break Invisibility or Sneaking.

name: Corrupted Blade
desc: Dagger attack that deals [X] physical damage and sets Decay and Diseased. Set Decaying for 2 turn(s). Set Diseased for 2 turn(s).

name: Daggers Drawn
desc: Whirl into a barrage of 5 stabs, each dealing [X] physical damage.

name: Fan of Knives
desc: Fling a dagger at every enemy around you, dealing [X] physical damage. Can backstab.

name: Gag Order
desc: Destroy [X] Magic Armour on target character. Silence target for 1 turn.

name: Mortal Blow
desc: Deal [140% weapon] physical damage. Damage is doubled if you are sneaking or invisible. Target is killed instantly if below 20% Viality.

name: Rupture Tendons
desc: Deal [X] physical damage to target character. When they try to move, they will take piercing damage. Set Ruptured Tendons for 2 turn(s).

name: Sawtooth Knife
desc: Pierce the enemy's Physical Armour and directly deals [X] piercing damage. Sets Bleeding if enemy has no Physical Armour for 3 turn(s).

name: Sleeping Arms
desc: Deal [X] physical damage and set Atrophy: your target can't use weapons or weapon skills anymore. Set Atrophy for 2 turn(s).

name: Terrifying Cruelty
desc: Dagger attack that deals [X] physical damage and sets Bleeding and Fear on target character. Set Bleeding for 3 turn(s)and set Terrified for 1 turn(s).

name: Throwing Knife
desc: Throw a knife at your opponent, dealing [X] physical damage. Can backstab.

name: Wind-Up Toy
desc: Summon a mechanical bomber at the target point. The bomber can explode, dealing fire damage and producing a fire surface. Does not break Invisibility or Sneaking. The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.
